title: N342 & N344 Between the Acts & Athletes
author: westwin

posts.post_title: N342 & N344 Between the Acts & Athletes
posts.post_content: Looking to buy any of the N344 Between the Acts Athletes cards.  Also interested in buying any early N342 cards with "Hall's Between the Acts" at the top.
head over to the sister site (nonsports) - link located top right on home page here - 2 largest accumulations of BTA's recently came to market - surmise someone might be able to help.

I want to thank Henry again for suggesting to post in the Vintage Non-Sports forum.  Excitingly, within days I was able to purchase a collection of the cards I was looking for (thanks Marty).  I've read a lot on the forum but this was my first time venturing out to actually purchase something.  Great experience and I'm glad this site/forum exists for us collectors who want to share our passions and be able to actually obtain the cards we love without the extra cost from places like ebay.
